title: (x) "Results Marion" two sans faces - Myriad, Verdana {Tiff}
content:

what fonts are the “Marion” text and the R”esults” text?

author: retoid

comments.content: Results looks like Myriad Black Condensed and Marion looks like Verdana Bold.
I dont think results is Myriad, the R isnt right
The R doesn’t match, does it. Hmm.
